column4: I want to start dual-booting Ubuntu, I have not installed it yet, and I am running Windows XP. Except, my only problem is I'm quite afraid that during the "partition" step I will lose some of my data. How can I avoid this, or am I paranoid?
You should always back up your data
I have never lost any (and I have installed Ubuntu many, many times). But if you don't back up your data, you will lose it some day :)
Frogzoo: Thanks. I will backup again. :) It's been a few months. But maybe I just wait until Gutsy Gibbon before dual-booting...
